00009 EaglePage* EaglePage_New(EagleDataType type, void *data, int totalSize, int count, int recordOffset, EagleBoolean freeData)
00010 {
00011     EaglePage *page = (EaglePage*) EagleMemory_Allocate("EaglePage_New.1", sizeof(EaglePage));
00012     if(NULL == page) {
00013         return NULL;
00014     }
00015     
00016     page->type = type;
00017     page->data = data;
00018     page->totalSize = totalSize;
00019     page->count = count;
00020     page->recordOffset = recordOffset;
00021     page->freeData = freeData;
00022     
00023     return page;
00024 }

00026 EaglePage* EaglePage_AllocInt(int count)
00027 {
00028     void *data = (void*) EagleMemory_MultiAllocate("EaglePage_AllocInt.1", sizeof(int), count);
00029     if(NULL == data) {
00030         return NULL;
00031     }
00032     return EaglePage_New(EagleDataTypeInteger, data, count, count, 0, EagleTrue);
00033 }

00035 EaglePage* EaglePage_AllocText(int count)
00036 {
00037     void *data = (void*) EagleMemory_MultiAllocate("EaglePage_AllocText.1", sizeof(char*), count);
00038     if(NULL == data) {
00039         return NULL;
00040     }
00041     return EaglePage_New(EagleDataTypeText, data, count, 0, 0, EagleTrue);

00044 void EaglePage_Delete(EaglePage *page)
00045 {
00046     if(NULL == page) {
00047         return;
00048     }
00049     
00050     if(EagleTrue == page->freeData) {
00051         EagleMemory_Free((void*) page->data);
00052     }
00053     EagleMemory_Free((void*) page);
00054 }

00056 EaglePage* EaglePage_Copy(EaglePage *page)
00057 {
00058     switch(page->type) {
00059             
00060         case EagleDataTypeUnknown:
00061             EagleLogger_Log(EagleLoggerSeverityError, "Cannot page of Unknown type.");
00062             return NULL;
00063         
00064         case EagleDataTypeInteger:
00065             return EaglePage_CopyInt_(page);
00066             
00067         case EagleDataTypeText:
00068             return EaglePage_CopyText_(page);
00069             
00070     }
00071 }
00072 
00073 EaglePage* EaglePage_CopyInt_(EaglePage *page)
00074 {
00075     size_t memorySize;
00076     int *newData;
00077     
00078     if(NULL == page) {
00079         return NULL;
00080     }
00081     
00082     memorySize = (size_t) page->count * sizeof(int);
00083     newData = (int*) EagleMemory_Allocate("EaglePage_CopyInt_.1", memorySize);
00084     if(NULL == newData) {
00085         return NULL;
00086     }
00087     
00088     memmove(newData, page->data, memorySize);
00089     return EaglePage_New(page->type, newData, page->totalSize, page->count, page->recordOffset, page->freeData);
00090 }
00091 
00092 EaglePage* EaglePage_CopyText_(EaglePage *page)
00093 {
00094     char **newData;
00095     int i;
00096     
00097     if(NULL == page) {
00098         return NULL;
00099     }
00100     
00101     newData = (char**) EagleMemory_MultiAllocate("EaglePage_CopyText_.1", sizeof(char*), page->count);
00102     
00103     if(NULL == newData) {
00104         return NULL;
00105     }
00106     
00107     for(i = 0; i < page->count; ++i) {
00108         newData[i] = ((char**) page->data)[i];
00109     }
00110     
00111     return EaglePage_New(page->type, newData, page->totalSize, page->count, page->recordOffset, page->freeData);
00112 }
00113 
00114 EaglePage* EaglePage_Alloc(EagleDataType type, int count)
00115 {
00116     switch(type) {
00117             
00118         case EagleDataTypeUnknown:
00119             return NULL;
00120             
00121         case EagleDataTypeInteger:
00122             return EaglePage_AllocInt(count);
00123             
00124         case EagleDataTypeText:
00125             return EaglePage_AllocText(count);
00126             
00127     }
00128 }

00130 char* EaglePage_toString(EaglePage *page)
00131 {
00132     char* buf = (char*) EagleMemory_Allocate("EaglePage_toString.1", 8192), *type;
00133     if(NULL == buf) {
00134         return NULL;
00135     }
00136     
00137     type = EagleDataType_typeToName(page->type);
00138     sprintf(buf, "EaglePage { type = %s, size = %d, count = %d, offset = %d }", type, page->totalSize, page->count,
00139             page->recordOffset);
00140     EagleMemory_Free(type);
00141     return buf;
00142 }
